title: Argentina cabinet reshuffle: Milei appoints new security and defense ministers - Buenos Aires Herald
snippet: Alejandra Monteoliva will become Argentina’s next security minister and Lieutenant General Carlos Alberto Presti, the new defense minister, the president’s communications team announced on Saturday afternoon.

title: Ministry of National Security (Argentina) - Wikipedia
snippet: The current minister of security is Patricia Bullrich, who assumed office in 2023 under President Javier Milei.

title: Explainer: Who's Who in Javier Milei's Cabinet? | AS/COA
snippet: Vice President: Victoria Villarruel Foreign Minister: Diana Mondino Economy Minister: Luis “Toto” Caputo Chief of Staff: Nicolás Posse Health Minister: Mario Russo Justice Minister: Mariano Cúneo Libarona Security Minister: Patricia Bullrich ...

title: Ministries of the Argentine Republic - Wikipedia
snippet: The ministries of Argentina, which form the cabinet, currently consist of eight ministries under a ministerial chief of staff. The ministers are appointed by and serve at the pleasure of the president.
